MSG_ACCOUNT_CREATED: Account created successfully, please check your email account to verify.
MSG_OTP_SENT: OTP sent to your email/mobile to reset password.
MSG_RECOVER_ACCOUNT: If your recovery email is correct, you should have received OTP to reset your account.
ERR_USER_NOT_FOUND: Account with email not found, please try signing up or correct provided details.
ERR_PASSWORD_NOT_MATCHED: Wrong Password, Try again or click Forgot Password to reset it.
ERR_USER_ALREADY_EXIST: An account with this email address already exists.
ERR_USER_ALREADY_EXIST_RECOVER: Recovery email is already associated with another account.
ERR_GENRIC_OTP_EXPIRE: OTP is not correct or expired, please try again.
ERR_RECOVEREMAIL_SAME: Primary email and Recovery email cannot be the same.
ERR_USER_BLOCKED: You account is not verified yet.
ERR_TOKEN_EXP: You session has expired, please login again
ERR_FB_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXP: Facebook access token is expired or not valid.
ERR_GOOGLE_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXP: Google access token is expired or not valid.
ERR_KAKAO_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXP: Kakao access token is expired or not valid.
MSG_PASSWORD_SENT: Your password has been sent to your email.
TRY_AGAIN: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again.
ERR_CURRENT_PASSWORD_NOT_MATCHED: New password and confirm password doesn't match
ADMIN_EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED: The email address you have entered is already registered.
NOT_LIKED_OWN_COMMENT: You can't like your own comment
NOT_DISLIKED_OWN_COMMENT: You can't dislike your own comment
SAVE_SUBSCRIPTION: Your subscription has been saved successfully.
REQUEST_SENT_SUCCESSFULLY: Your request has been sent successfully.
ADMIN_ACCOUNT_NOT_VERIFIED_YET: You account is not verified yet
PLZ_CONTACT_TO_ADMIN: You are blocked by admin. Please contact admin at  app-kor@startenglishnow.net.
CONTACT_US_REQUEST_SENT_SUCCESSFULLY: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
ERR_USER_NOT_VERIFIED_EMAIL: An account with this email address already exists. Please verify it.
ERR_LESSON_DELETED_BY_ADMIN: This lesson is deleted by admin.
